O unico ponto negativo Ã© os jogadores nÃ£o receberem nada pelo rank, as vezes temos muito trabalho, muito tempo gasto tentando pegar rank, e uns brindes cairia muito bem, porÃ©m nÃ£o ganhamos nada. Mas em si, nÃ£o tenho nada o que reclamar do jogo, os graficos batem com o tamanho do jogo, Ã© leve, pega na maioria dos computadores e o grafico nao Ã© feio. Excellent jeu, semble trÃ¨s complexe avec tout ses informations, skills, lore, etc. mais est en fait bien construit et intuitif. Ce joue aussi bien entre amis qu'avec d'autres joueurs alÃ©atoire. Une bonne balance est maintenu entre les capacitÃ©s du Killer et des Survivants ! Excellent jeu.

EXPECTACULAR APARECI AL LADO DEL ASESINO Y NADIE ME AYUDO Y ME MORI EN EL GANCHO, JUEGO DEL AÃ‘O 10/10

Devs have worked 2 years for a mediocre mmr system called the sbmm which is even worse than their previous emblem system, I have to ask what were they doing in those 2 years, this can even be thought up in 10 minutes that's how simple it is, it rewards killers for camping and tunneling to secure kills and survivors to ignore everything but gens and get out asap.

Survivor soloQ is awful and even worse than it was with the previous rank system. 
With friends it can be fun if you don't get those campers that are increasing in number because of the sbmm change.

Killer when you start it is fun but the more you play the less fun it gets to play.
Now with the change gens are flying much faster so you are forced to bring slowdown otherwise you won't have a game, and let's not talk about the cheaters that you need video proof of to get banned, if you're like me and don't record then tough luck your report will not amount to anything.

The devs just need to focus on making the game good. Killer sided update stacking huge gen regression perks, or nonstop aura reveal perks. I have a consistent 30-31ms ping and I'm stilling getting hit through solid walls, around corners, several seconds after vaulting or falling, and during pallet stuns. Each update adds more killer/survivor de-sync issues.
Apesar de que o assassino tem 100% de chance de ganhar, jogar com amigos Ã© divertido !!

Es un juego de terror y supervivencia es totalmente rejugable, con diversidad de personajes y habilidades, algunas comunes y otras especÃ­ficas. Ã‰stas Ãºltimas compartibles con el resto a partir de los niveles 30,35 y 40.

El enfoque del juego es generalmente modo sigilo (superviviente) o modo caza (killer). Para los supervivientes, que es lo que mas juego, tienes habilidades para ser  ser muy escurridizo y huir, servir de apoyo medico, de rescate, acelerar procesos, entre otras muchas combinaciones. 

El juego base para poder jugar incluye varios supervivientes y asesinos sin tener que comprar DLC . Las expansiones son relativamente baratas ahora mismo, aunque coger todas es dejarse un riÃ±Ã³n y medio xD. AhÃ­ cada uno opta por cuales escoge.

En cuanto a su ambientaciÃ³n, es genial poder recrear pelÃ­culas de miedo con los asesinos detrÃ¡s de ti, sentir la tensiÃ³n y huir de tu perseguidos. La calidad grÃ¡fica es bastante buena.

AsÃ­ que Ã©ste juego y su estilo tiene mis dieces.

PD. AÃ±ado que realmente he jugado muchÃ­simas mÃ¡s horas, solo que no con el juego steam, pero lo vi rebajado y volvÃ­ a enamorarme <3

PD2. Odio el Doctor, es un dolor de muelas que mejor que no venga a curarte Ã©l xD, aunque estÃ¡ todo el rato encima, te detecta con su habilidad para que grites, las pruebas son al revÃ©s, ves su sombra hasta en la sopa .. por dios..
Great game despite the lack of bug fixes
Ngl, graphics are pretty bad, but the game runs smooth on most decent pcs. Its actually pretty entertaining and it gets you kinda hooked (see what I did there? lol).

This game has come such a long way, and I cant help but support it. It may not fun to play alone, but playing with friends is always a good time. Some things obviously need some work, such as all survivor gameplay & hitboxes, but this game has come a long way and you have to be understanding. so yeah, check it out :)

This game is garbage. The developers are scummy and don't even make an effort to change any bugs or glitches, and they blatantly do not listen to the community. I do not recommend at all. Don't give these devs your money.

I have played this on all 3 platforms, I just wish you could keep your progress cross platform. With that said, each version seems to have their own set of strengths and weaknesses. Steam/Computer is lightning fast, but I am trying to get used to the controls. Every killer on the computer seems to be The Huntress as players are so toxic they would rather kill you with glitch techniques then try to make the game fun for all the players. Xbox is pretty even, and definitely my go to. PS4 is ok, I just hate having to level a 3rd set of survivors and killers, as well as having to buy any expansions I am interested in a 3rd time.
A nice "horror" Online game. A lot of Killers, a lot of Survivers and A LOT of Perks to get. Gets new Updates and itÂ´s still fun playing (imo obsly)
the only thing scary about this game is the hit boxes
